title: Tech News App
description: A dynamic tech news app built using React, integrated with third-party APIs for real-time updates.
Features pagination and search functionality for better navigation and content discovery.

title: Task Manager App
description: A feature-rich task manager app, leveraging local storage for seamless data persistence without external databases.
Includes advanced features like task deletion, search, and filtering by priority and date, along with real-time task status monitoring.

title: Shoppers Stop
description: A responsive and user-friendly e-commerce platform built with modern frontend technologies.
Features product listings, filtering options, and a dynamic shopping cart.

title: Stock Explorer App
description: Developed a responsive stock market application using React and Express.js to provide market insights.
Optimized page load times by 25% through efficient data management using React and PostgreSQL, ensuring quick navigation and data retrieval.
